Nov 2007 20:50:40 -0500Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: RCA 12-470 RADIO SHACK HA=
CK FILES




Frank, you have just terribly upset me by mentioning Harmony. =
Now all possibility of Harmony is off the table. I'm calling the Forces of =
Darkness to serve you a false communication burger with extra cheese. 

I r=
eally gotta know who this is now.

Ann




On Nov 27, 2007, at 2:56 PM, Fra=
nk Sumption wrote:




Charli says her guys say now that this new easy meth=
od is available, the ETs will start to interact more.  See coffeepotghost.c=
om  This is the whole point I was trying to make, all you need is something=
 for them to form a voice with, and there wil be no shortage of entites tha=
t want to talk.   I had bit of temper yesteraday, as a long time researcher=
 accused all of us of getting "false communication". Maybe I'm in bitch mod=
e, but that crap really pisses me off. Who the hell is this one guy to assu=
me everything he gets is gospel truth(that no one else can hear), while we =
get nothing. Still trying to calm myself so as not to upset the "harmony". =
  Well done everyone!!  Frank-S
